room_title: Escape room "Art Gallery" by The Escape Room Indianapolis in Indianapolis
review: Art Gallery is the first room my wife and I attempted at this location. Art Gallery has a great blend of challenges and is one of the best rooms we have played. Vicky our host was great by not guiding us but still informing us of the right things at the right time. We strongly recommend this room.

room_title: Escape room "Art Gallery" by The Escape Room Indianapolis in Indianapolis
review: Man, was this a good time! My wife and I were paired with another couple, and we had such a blast. The room we had (Art Gallery) was sufficiently tricky without being TOO difficult. And our room coach was wonderful. Can't say enough good things about our experience here.

room_title: Escape room "Art Gallery" by The Escape Room Indianapolis in Indianapolis
review: We had a great experience stealing the Mona Lisa tonight! Miss Brandy was a great host! Cannot wait to come back and try another room!

room_title: Escape room "Art Gallery" by The Escape Room Indianapolis in Indianapolis
review: Our group of 7 had a fantastic time in The Art Gallery! Thanks Natalie, you were an amazing host for our heist!

room_title: Escape room "Art Gallery" by The Escape Room Indianapolis in Indianapolis
review: Great time. We locked 8 type A personalities in the art room and survived. And we escaped. It is the thing to do downtown. I rate this a strong ten. A couple of things the owners need to do. Put another 4-5 pieces of furniture in each room and 10 more other objects. It was to easy to hone in on the clues, there needs to be a lot more false items to explore. Great job though, we all loved it

room_title: Escape room "Art Gallery" by The Escape Room Indianapolis in Indianapolis
review: The Art Gallery is ideal for two families! We had some great problem solvers and we made it out! Everyone worked together and the kids really got into it. Unique entertainment!
